A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movias an absolute mess and severe disappointment. I originally saw it on the Sunday night of opening weekend and decided to give it a couple days before I wrote a review or rating. Before the movie came out\, I was concerned that they'd kill the character Luke Skywalker. What Rian Johnson did was much worse as he demolished everything there was to love about the character. This was a total hack job that was more about clearing out the old for the sake of future movies than it was about making a good Star Wars movie consistent with the original trilogy.
